applicant-name.name: SHENZHEN DONGQING ENERGY TECH CO LTD
深圳市东氢能源科技有限公司

invention-title: Efficient multistage separation and purification device for hydrogen production from nuclear wastewater
一种高效核废水制氢多级分离提纯装置

abstract.p: The invention discloses an efficient nuclear wastewater hydrogen production multi-stage separation and purification device, and belongs to the field of nuclear wastewater hydrogen production, the efficient nuclear wastewater hydrogen production multi-stage separation and purification device comprises a nuclear wastewater separation tank and a first motor arranged on the right side of the nuclear wastewater separation tank, and the top of the nuclear wastewater separation tank is fixedly connected with a nuclear wastewater feeding pipe; according to the efficient nuclear wastewater hydrogen production multi-stage separation and purification device, a first motor drives a rotating rod to rotate, the rotating rod drives a cam to rotate and abut against a connecting block, the connecting block can drive a collision rod on the top to slide upwards and collide with a first filter plate, and the first filter plate rotates upwards after being collided; a guide rod is driven by a connecting column to compress a first spring to slide upwards, so that a first filter plate vibrates, large-particle impurities on the first filter plate can vibrate, the first filter plate is effectively prevented from being blocked when nuclear wastewater is separated, and the nuclear wastewater separation efficiency is higher.

本发明公开了一种高效核废水制氢多级分离提纯装置，属于核废水制氢领域，一种高效核废水制氢多级分离提纯装置，包括核废水分离罐以及设置在核废水分离罐右侧的第一电机，所述核废水分离罐的顶部固定连接有核废水进料管，该高效核废水制氢多级分离提纯装置，通过第一电机带动转杆转动，转杆带动凸轮转动，与连接块抵触，可以使连接块带动顶部的碰撞杆向上滑动，与第一过滤板碰撞，第一过滤板在被碰撞后向上转动，通过连接柱带动导杆压缩第一弹簧向上滑动，使第一过滤板产生振动，可以使第一过滤板上的大颗粒杂质产生振动，有效的防止第一过滤板在分离核废水时产生堵塞，使得核废水分离效率更高。
